content.title: Interactive Portfolio
content.description: Developed an innovative, web-based interactive portfolio that visually represents my diverse software development skill set through orbiting bubbles. The application offers an engaging user experience with animated interactions, allowing visitors to explore my professional journey and accomplishments in a unique, memorable way.

infoBoxes.title: Key Features
infoBoxes.content: Interactive bubbles, Dynamic content loading, Responsive design

infoBoxes.title: Showcase
infoBoxes.content: Creative design skills, Technical proficiency, Multidisciplinary expertise

items.text: A demonstration of the innovative, web-based interactive CV/portfolio showcasing diverse skills through orbiting bubbles.
